The '''Bloody Mist Sword Art: Bone Mutilation''' is a technique unique to [[Kirigakure]].<ref name="Boruto novel">''Boruto: Naruto the Movie'' novel</ref> 

== Usage ==
Using [[Hiramekarei]], the user creates a large amount of light-blue chakra needles, which are then sent flying at their opponent. Once impaled, the needles disrupt the victim's [[chakra pathway system]], which will then lead to them slowly dying.<ref name="Boruto novel" />
